sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="addToCart()" class="bg-primary w-full py-2 rounded text-white mt-3">Tilføj til kurv</button>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from "vue";
import { cart } from "@/store/cart";

const props = defineProps({
  product: {
    type: Object
  },
  number: {
    type: Number,
    default: 1
  }
});

const addToCart = () => {
  cart.addProduct(props.product, props.number);
}
</script>
